text: yadi tumane bhalaee kee to apane hee lie bhalaee kee aur yadi tumane buraee kee to apane hee lie kee." phir jab doosare vaade ka mauqa aa gaya (to hamane tumhaare muqaabale mein aise prabal ko uthaaya) ki ve tumhaare chehare bigaad den aur masjid (baitulamaqadis) mein ghuse the aur taaki jis cheez par bhee unaka zor chale vinashti kar daalen
